about_the_game:
Cock Fight Simulator is an innovative multiplayer fighting game that blends action and humor, set in a 3D third-person perspective where you control chickens and cocks battling it out in dynamic arenas. Currently developed by 4 university students, our game offers an engaging 1vs1 mode across three beautifully designed maps, with six unique weapons that offer a variety of ranged and melee combat styles. Each weapon has its own distinct characteristics, providing players with multiple tactical options during matches.

We'd really love to recieve feedback about bugs to solve and new ideas to implement in the game (also, a nice and active player base is a requirement to include a matchmaking system). Right now, we plan on expanding the multiplayer mode to allow more diverse lobbies, add new weapons, maps and more customization for the roosters.

content_descriptors.notes: The only mature content is related to violence against animals (roosters) and usage of weapons (such as swords, bows, rifles, etc.). Blood is represented by simple red particles emitted by a player when hit.
